Html:
I need to be able to render a set of maps to a bitmaps based on a known center point and zoom. I've tried using the BigMapMaker demo, but not getting anywhere. Any anyone done something similar or could help me?

Thanks
Or ... does anyone know of a way I can calculate an AreaLatLng if I know a pixel width and height, a PointLatLng and Zoom?
not getting anywhere? -> it works perfectly, no problems here

Maybe I'm not clear. I want to render a Bitmap that is 640x480 pixels. I want the map centered at a position and zoomed to a specific zoom. I want to be able to render these maps like the BigMapMaker test works, without any UI. BigMapMaker uses an area, but I don't have the area as input parameters, so I need to create an area based on the center and zoom. Even at that, I'm not sure this example will scale properly.
radioman can you tell me what is working perfectly for you? Does it relate to my query at all?
